title: President Donald J. Trump Announces Intent to Designate Individual to a Key Administration Post â€“ The White House
content:
Nominations & Appointments			
Issued on:
December 20, 2018
President Donald J. Trump today announced his intent to designate the following individual to a key position in his Administration:Joseph M. Otting of Nevada, to be the Acting Director of the Federal Housing Finance Agency, vice Melvin L. Watt, resignation effective January 6, 2019.Mr. Otting was confirmed by the United States Senate to serve as the Comptroller of the Currency at the Department of the Treasury.
